root.name: EOE: Eve of Extinction
root.description: Overview Josh in action! You play as a character called Josh Calloway who has a weapon called a “Legacy”. This weapon can take many forms, but you start off with just two; a Sword and Rod. As you progress through the game you will battle various bosses who have their own legacy weapons. Defeating these bosses rewards you with their weapon. This means that you have the ability to switch to that weapon, even in the middle of a fight, allowing you to string large combos together. Contained inside your “Legacy” is the transformed soul of Josh’s girlfriend. According to the Wisdom Corporation (who created the weapon, and also act as the big evil corporation that your character is aiming to bring down) this is supposedly what gives the weapon it’s power, by fusing a human soul with a rare sort of metal found only in the lost city of Atlantis. The problems with the game are mainly down to slight technical issues, like a terrible camera which is rarely in the right position and can’t be controlled manually either. Also, fighting large groups ends up a bit like a Jet Li martial arts movie, in that whilst you fight one baddie the rest sort of dance around you waiting for there turn.
